### Quantitative Ecotoxicology, page 45

Get the data from [here](https://raw.github.com/EDiLD/r-ed/master/quantitative_ecotoxicology/data/p45.csv) and read it into R:
```{r include=FALSE}
SULFATE <- read.table("/home/edisz/Documents/Uni/Projects/blog/quantitative_ecotoxicology/data/p45.csv", 
                  header = TRUE, 
                  sep = ";")
```

```{r, eval=FALSE}
SULFATE <- read.table("p45.csv", 
                  header = TRUE, 
                  sep = ";")
```
